rows.label: qev025201_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh oh! You're talking to me, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Does that mean you'll listen to me? Because, um,
I've got something to say, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, come on! Don't go dragging randoms into this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:gender p1=buddy p2=lady ], don't listen to her.
You're better off just walking away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_JNK0010
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev025201_SEL0011
rows.name: Hear the Ma-non out.

rows.label: qev025201_JNK0020
rows.name: Leave

rows.label: qev025201_SEL0021
rows.name: Walk away as recommended.

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, that's great, isn't it? Because every time strangers
meet there's a chance it might be fate, right?
We're all on the KissNet, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Er, KissNet? No. Met? But what's a kiss met, right?
That doesn't make any... Kismet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0007
rows.name:
Whatever. Earth culture has many strange concepts,
doesn't it? But it's clear you're very kind for for for
listening, so let me get to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0008
rows.name: Oh, that's too too sad, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0009
rows.name:
There must be some reason our paths crossed today,
yes? Yes. So what harm is there in listening?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0010
rows.name: Please hear me out, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0011
rows.name:
The proprietor here won't let me in her store even
though I'm a paying customer, you see? All I want to
do is purchase some Earth-style clothes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Look, I didn't want to be rude, but you've forced me to
put this as bluntly as I can...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0013
rows.name:
I've always had this...thing about reptiles, okay?
They totally creep me out, big time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0014
rows.name:
And I just can't handle Ma-non in my shop. I'm sorry,
and it's not personal, but it's just my deal. No offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0015
rows.name:
That's a very very sad reason. This reptile tribe of
yours must be very terrible people, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Please don't lump me in with your mean tribe,
okay? In fact, if you look closely, you'll see I'm
actually quite cute. Or adorable, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0017
rows.name: Look look look, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0018
rows.name: Gaaah, stop! Get away from me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0019
rows.name:
It's not just how you LOOK, okay? It's about biology!
Germs and stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0020
rows.name:
You could be packing all sorts of disgusting diseases
we never saw on Earth! ...No offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0021
rows.name: I don't think this is getting us anywhere, is it? Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Aha! I have it, yes? I will stand right here in front of
your shop, day and night, for for the next few days.
...Or maybe weeks or months?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0023
rows.name:
That way you can see that I have no diseases which
need cause you concern, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0024
rows.name:
It will also give you ample time to grow accustomed to
my cute face, won't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0025
rows.name: A good solution, yes? Yes. Very very good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ab-so-LUTELY not! No way, nuh-uh, not happening,
not even over my cold, stinking, swollen corpse!
...Again, no offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0027
rows.name:
You see what I mean? She's completely unreasonable!
Can you please help me explain to her that I just can't
do what she's asking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0028
rows.name:
I can't be the only one dealing with this kind of thing,
so maybe we could get a legal ruling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0029
rows.name:
If I could show her a formal decision from the
government, she might actually listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0030
rows.name: Oh! I would like this as well, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0031
rows.name:
If your government grants Ma-non the right to shop,
I'll be able to pick up cute clothing wherever I like,
won't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0032
rows.name: So I also hope you look into this, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0033
rows.name:
I'll just be here with my face squished up against the
store window until you return. Er, this is a common
practice, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Please ask the government to hurry with their decision.
I'm going to be a nervous wreck until she clears out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0101
rows.name: Earth clothing is very very interesting, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0102
rows.name:
I look forward to buying much once you have spoken
to your government agents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0201
rows.name:
The government said it wished to be friends with my
kind, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025201_MSG0202
rows.name:
Then I hope Alesa can soon be convinced to allow me
in to to to buy her lovely clothing?[ST:wait ]
